import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import CardBack from "../assets/images/deck/z_cardback.png"; function Board(){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const cards = [ ["A", "K", "Q", "J", "T", "9", "8", "7", "6", "5", "4", "3", "2"], ["A", "K", "Q", "J", "T", "9", "8", "7", "6", "5", "4", "3", "2"], ["A", "K", "Q", "J", "T", "9", "8", "7", "6", "5", "4", "3", "2"], ["A", "K", "Q", "J", "T", "9", "8", "7", "6", "5", "4", "3", "2"] ]; return(
setShow(true)}>
setShow(false)}> Board Card Selector {/*
{{ card }}
*/}
) } export default Board;
